Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg

[Java] Class DefaultGrailsDomainConfiguration

      • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.orm.hibernate.cfg.DefaultGrailsDomainConfiguration
      • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
        GrailsDomainConfiguration

        public class DefaultGrailsDomainConfiguration
extends Configuration

        Creates runtime configuration mapping for the Grails domain classes based on the work done in the Hibernate Annotations project

        Authors:
        Graeme Rocher
        Since:
        06-Jul-2005
